name: Tappy Holidays - Falling Balls
description:
Tappy Holidays is a FREE, quick, little tap game with a holiday theme. In Tappy Holidays, you try to keep the holiday ornaments from hitting the ground by tapping on them to remove them.

The longer you are successful, the faster the balls will drop. The game is over when an ornament hits the ground.

Compare your score with other players. Nice graphics and a holiday tune makes Tappy Holidays a fun little game to play around the holidays... or anytime!
